scenes.description: Takane Lui and Mori Calliope perform a duet of 'BLOODY STREAM' from JoJo's Bizarre Adventure.
MC section where Takane Lui and Mori Calliope talk about their performance and their previous collaborations today.
Mori Calliope talks to the audience (Dead Beats) about the hashtag #happymoriday and introduces a merchandise video.

subtitles.original: Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: JoJo!
subtitles.english: JoJo!

subtitles.original: JoJo!
subtitles.english: JoJo!

subtitles.original: Go, Lui!
subtitles.english: Go, Lui!

subtitles.original: 漲る力に
subtitles.english: With overflowing power

subtitles.original: 打ち付ける鼓動は証
subtitles.english: My pounding heartbeat is proof

subtitles.original: 友の声
subtitles.english: Of my friend's voice

subtitles.original: Woo! Woo!
subtitles.english: Woo! Woo!

subtitles.original: 滲んだ痛みと
subtitles.english: With the blurred pain

subtitles.original: 今生き抜く意味を交わしながら
subtitles.english: While exchanging the meaning of surviving now

subtitles.original: Calli! Yeah!
subtitles.english: Calli! Yeah!

subtitles.original: おまえの意志が
subtitles.english: Your will

subtitles.original: 夜明けを導く
subtitles.english: Shall lead the dawn

subtitles.original: まばゆいほどに気高く
subtitles.english: So dazzlingly noble

subtitles.original: Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: 光射す丘へ灼熱の空へ
subtitles.english: To the hill where the light shines, to the scorching sky

subtitles.original: 魂がぶつかり合う旅路へ
subtitles.english: To the journey where souls collide

subtitles.original: 悲しみに塗られた未来を救え
subtitles.english: Save the future coated in sadness

subtitles.original: Like a Bloody Soul 燃やせ Like a Bloody Star
subtitles.english: Like a Bloody Soul, burn it up! Like a Bloody Star

subtitles.original: 炎裂き風を断ちその先へ
subtitles.english: Tearing through flames, cutting through the wind, beyond that

subtitles.original: 怖れずに何も留まらずに進め
subtitles.english: Without fear, without stopping for anything, move forward

subtitles.original: 流れの中
subtitles.english: In the flow

subtitles.original: 共鳴する
subtitles.english: Resonating

subtitles.original: 運命の波紋
subtitles.english: The ripples of fate

subtitles.original: 心に...
subtitles.english: In my heart...

subtitles.original: Yeah! Yeah, yeah, come on!
subtitles.english: Yeah! Yeah, yeah, come on!

subtitles.original: 闇を欺いて切なをかわして
subtitles.english: Deceive the darkness, dodging the moment

subtitles.original: 刃すり抜け奴らの隙を突け
subtitles.english: Slipping through the blades, strike their openings

subtitles.original: 貫いた思いが未来を拓く
subtitles.english: The piercing feelings will open up the future

subtitles.original: Like a Bloody Storm 熱く Like a Bloody Storm
subtitles.english: Like a Bloody Storm, passionately Like a Bloody Storm

subtitles.original: 血脈に刻まれた因縁に
subtitles.english: In the destiny carved into the lineage

subtitles.original: 浮き上がる消えない誇りの絆
subtitles.english: Rising up, the bonds of pride that will never fade

subtitles.original: 握りしめて
subtitles.english: Grip it tight

subtitles.original: Woo! JoJo!
subtitles.english: Woo! JoJo!

subtitles.original:
いいねー、ジョジョポーズ！
Yeah!
subtitles.english:
Nice JoJo pose!
Yeah!

subtitles.original:
素敵！
Perfect!
subtitles.english:
Lovely!
Perfect!

subtitles.original:
いや、やっぱりめちゃめちゃ上手かった！
いやいやいや。
subtitles.english:
Man, you were really good after all!
No, no, no.

subtitles.original:
いや、でも今日2回目...
Two times, second time is 3D collaboration!
subtitles.english:
But this is our second 3D collab today...
Two times, second time is 3D collaboration!

subtitles.original: ...の3Dコラボだもんね。
subtitles.english: ...right?

subtitles.original:
そうだね。First time is いじめっ子 Bully.
Yes, yes, yes.
subtitles.english:
That's right. The first time was the 'Bully' collab.
Yes, yes, yes.

subtitles.original: 超楽しかった！
subtitles.english: It was super fun!

subtitles.original: いや楽しかった、今日はお呼びいただきましてありがとうございました。
subtitles.english: It was fun, thank you so much for inviting me today.

subtitles.original: いえいえ、こちらこそ！超楽しかった、本当に！
subtitles.english: No problem, same here! It was really fun, truly!

subtitles.original: これからも続くのでね。
subtitles.english: The show will continue after this.

subtitles.original: そうですね、Please enjoy!
subtitles.english: That's right, please enjoy!

subtitles.original: はい、エンジョイします！後でね、ケーキ一緒に...
subtitles.english: Yes, I'll enjoy it! Let's eat cake together later...

subtitles.original:
...食べよう。
はい！
subtitles.english:
...let's eat.
Yes!

subtitles.original: Yes, yes, yes. これね、食べましょう。
subtitles.english: Yes, yes, yes. Let's eat this.

subtitles.original:
そうだね、食べましょう。めちゃめちゃ上手そうだから。
Have a nice day today!
subtitles.english:
Right, let's eat. It looks delicious.
Have a nice day today!

subtitles.original: It looks so good! Thank you, I'll do my best!
subtitles.english: It looks so good! Thank you, I'll do my best!

subtitles.original: And Dead Beats, see you!
subtitles.english: And Dead Beats, see you!

subtitles.original:
バイバイ！
Bye-bye Dead Beats!
subtitles.english:
Bye-bye!
Bye-bye Dead Beats!

subtitles.original:
じゃあ、また！
バイ、ルイ姉！
subtitles.english:
Well then, see you later!
Bye, Lui-nee!

subtitles.original:
See you!
バイバイ！
subtitles.english:
See you!
Bye-bye!

subtitles.original: There goes Lui.
subtitles.english: There goes Lui.

subtitles.original: Lui-nee, saikou. I knew that she was gonna sing that song so good.
subtitles.english: Lui-nee is the best. I knew that she was gonna sing that song so well.

subtitles.original: I knew it! I knew it!
subtitles.english: I knew it! I knew it!

subtitles.original: She like, wasn't super, super familiar with it before, but like...
subtitles.english: She like, wasn't super, super familiar with it before, but like...

subtitles.original: ...she knocked it out of the park. I knew she was gonna be amazing.
subtitles.english: ...she knocked it out of the park. I knew she was gonna be amazing.

subtitles.original: Saikou, it's like a blessing for my ears. That's why I chose Lui-nee.
subtitles.english: She's the best, it's like a blessing for my ears. That's why I chose Lui-nee.

subtitles.original: Because I knew she would bless my ears with her low tone. Suteki datta, hontou ni ne.
subtitles.english: Because I knew she would bless my ears with her low tone. It was lovely, truly.

subtitles.original: God, she is so amazing.
subtitles.english: God, she is so amazing.

subtitles.original: Now that, she's a busy lady, so I'm gonna let her go.
subtitles.english: Now then, she's a busy lady, so I'm gonna let her go.

subtitles.original: Ah, it's a bit lonely. But that's okay, that's okay.
subtitles.english: Ah, it's a bit lonely. But that's okay, that's okay.

subtitles.original: I'm gonna show you something. I want to show you a thing.
subtitles.english: I'm gonna show you something. I want to show you a thing.

subtitles.original: You both slayed it. Thank you so much! You guys are very sweet.
subtitles.english: You both slayed it. Thank you so much! You guys are very sweet.

subtitles.original: Really amazing indeed. That was straight fire. Her voice is beautiful. Agreed, so much.
subtitles.english: Really amazing indeed. That was straight fire. Her voice is beautiful. Agreed, so much.

subtitles.original: So, we're gonna watch something so I can sit down for a second, right?
subtitles.english: So, we're gonna watch something so I can sit down for a second, right?

subtitles.original: We're gonna watch a video.
subtitles.english: We're gonna watch a video.

subtitles.original: Now, you guys know it's my birthday, right?
subtitles.english: Now, you guys know it's my birthday, right?

subtitles.original: It's Mori Day!
subtitles.english: It's Mori Day!

subtitles.original: You can tweet out #happymoriday with your screenshots...
subtitles.english: You can tweet out #happymoriday with your screenshots...

subtitles.original: ...and to show your appreciation for your Mori if you'd like. Should you be so inclined, right?
subtitles.english: ...and to show your appreciation for your Mori if you'd like. Should you be so inclined, right?

subtitles.original: If you'd like. So...
subtitles.english: If you'd like. So...

subtitles.original: Additionally, there's something I want to show you guys.
subtitles.english: Additionally, there's something I want to show you guys.

subtitles.original: It's a video.
subtitles.english: It's a video.

subtitles.original: A video of things you can buy!
subtitles.english: A video of things you can buy!

subtitles.original: That's right! Do you guys want to buy things?
subtitles.english: That's right! Do you guys want to buy things?

subtitles.original: 骸骨ちゃん、ほら見て。一緒に見よう。
subtitles.english: Skelly-chan, look. Let's watch together.

subtitles.original: Check it out, everyone!
subtitles.english: Check it out, everyone!
